title: Tibet: the lost mystery
brief_description: The first of a two part documentary that examines the mysterious story of Tibet. It is the story of a country unseen by Europeans until early this century, of its destruction by invading Chinese in 1950 and the flight into India of the Dalai Lama with 100,000 Tibetans.
